edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.esb.listener

Class EsbHttpHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mortbay.component.AbstractLifeCycle
      • org.mortbay.jetty.handler.AbstractHandler
        • edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.esb.listener.EsbHttpHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.mortbay.component.LifeCycle, org.mortbay.jetty.Handler

    public class EsbHttpHandler
extends org.mortbay.jetty.handler.AbstractHandler
    Class the processes data recieved on HTTP(S) port, extracts the payload and passes it to EsbListener for processing, returning an http result code and human readable result string to calling client
